channel.title: Waze on Development Data Partnership
channel.description: Recent content in Waze on Development Data Partnership

item.title: Visualizing Millions of Waze Traffic Alerts with Big Query, H3 and Dask
item.description: Waze for Cities, a Data Partner of the Development Data Partnership, connects government partners to high quality, frequent and granular traffic data extremely valuable in informing public sector, transport and urban planning as well as addressing the United Nations’s Sustainable Development Goals.

item.title: Improving Road Safety in Nairobi
item.description: Challenge: Kenya has one of the highest estimated crash fatality rates worldwide but is challenged to address the problem without adequate data.
